description: Creates an email contact for the provided email address.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the email contact.

parameters.name: emailAddress
parameters.description: The email address this email contact points to. The activation email and any subscribed emails are sent here.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A map of tags assigned to a resource. A tag is a string-to-string map of key-value pairs. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
